dict.string: Join Thumbtack's beta program. Get the latest software immediately. If you havenâ€™t already done so, once installed sign up with this Google Form.

#!/bin/zsh
# This script was created by Adam Anklewicz at Thumbtack on Thursday February 16, 2023 # Will check to see if the computer is enrolled in the beta program. # For the Internal Tools' Endpoint Team # Version 1.0 - 2023-02-16 # Version 1.1 - 2023-05-09 Remove any seedutil dependencies
current=$(date +"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %z")
if [ -f /Library/Preferences/com.thumbtack.betaprogram.plist ]; then currentState=$(/usr/bin/defaults read /Library/Preferences/com.thumbtack.betaprogram Program) if [ $currentState = "CustomerSeed" ]; then echo "Device is enrolled in CustomerSeed." echo "Device was enrolled on" $(/usr/bin/defaults read /Library/Preferences/com.thumbtack.betaprogram DateAdded) exit 1 elif [ $currentState = "Production" ]; then echo "Device is enrolled in Production" echo "Device was enrolled on" $(/usr/bin/defaults read /Library/Preferences/com.thumbtack.betaprogram DateAdded) exit 0 fi else /usr/bin/defaults write /Library/Preferences/com.thumbtack.betaprogram Program "Production" /usr/bin/defaults write /Library/Preferences/com.thumbtack.betaprogram DateAdded -date "$current" echo "Device is enrolled in Production." exit 0 fi

#!/bin/zsh
# This script was created by Adam Anklewicz at Thumbtack on Wendesday February 15, 2023 # This script will create a file and store the computer's status in the beta program. # For the Internal Tools' Endpoint Team # Version 1.0 - 2023-02-15
current=$(date +"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %z")
/usr/bin/defaults write /Library/Preferences/com.thumbtack.betaprogram Program "CustomerSeed" /usr/bin/defaults write /Library/Preferences/com.thumbtack.betaprogram DateAdded -date "$current"
/usr/local/bin/jamf recon

#!/bin/zsh
# This script was created by Adam Anklewicz at Thumbtack on Wendesday February 15, 2023 # This script will set the device back to the default behaviour... # Set com.thumbtack.betaprogram to "Production" # For the Internal Tools' Endpoint Team # Version 1.0 - 2023-02-15
current=$(date +"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %z")
/usr/bin/defaults write /Library/Preferences/com.thumbtack.betaprogram Program "Production" /usr/bin/defaults write /Library/Preferences/com.thumbtack.betaprogram DateAdded -date "$current"
/usr/local/bin/jamf recon
